00025 Implemente_instanciable(System,"System",Interprete);

00028 // printOn et readOn

00030 Sortie& System::printOn(Sortie& s ) const
00031 {
00032   return s << que_suis_je() << "\n";
00033 }
00034 
00035 Entree& System::readOn(Entree& is )
00036 {
00037 // 
00038 // 
00039   return is;
00040 }
00041 
00042 Entree& System::interpreter(Entree& is)
00043 {
00044   Nom instruction,suite;
00045   is >> instruction;
00046   if (instruction[0]!='"')
00047     {
00048       Cerr<<"In System, instruction should begin by \""<<finl;
00049       Cerr<<"instruction beginning "<<instruction;
00050       exit();
00051     }
00052   instruction.suffix("\"");
00053   while(instruction[instruction.longueur()-2]!='"')
00054     {
00055       is >> suite;
00056       assert(is.good());
00057       instruction+=" ";
00058       instruction+=suite;
00059     }
00060   instruction.prefix("\"");
00061 
00062 
00063   if (je_suis_maitre())
00064     {
00065       Cerr<<"Shell command executed: " << instruction<<finl;
00066       int error = system(instruction);
00067       if (error)
00068         {
00069           Cerr << "The shell command returns an error: " << error << finl;
00070           Cerr << "Check your data file." << finl;
00071           exit();
00072         }
00073     }
00074   barrier();
00075   return is;
00076 }
